member.name: P:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.PollDelayMsecs
member.summary: How often to check if there are new messages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.FetchBatchSize
member.summary: How many messages to fetch at a time.

member.name: P:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.FetchLockSeconds
member.summary: How long to lock messages once fetched. Azure Queue default is 30 secs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.MaxRetriesBeforePoisonQueue
member.summary: How many times to dequeue a messages and process before moving it to a poison queue.

member.name: P:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.PoisonQueueSuffix
member.summary: Suffix used for the poison queues.

member.name: M:Microsoft.KernelMemory.AzureQueuesConfig.Validate
member.summary: Verify that the current state is valid.

member.name: E:Microsoft.KernelMemory.Orchestration.AzureQueues.AzureQueuesPipeline.Received
member.summary: Event triggered when a message is received

member.name: M:Microsoft.KernelMemory.Orchestration.AzureQueues.AzureQueuesPipeline.DispatchMessages(System.Object,System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs)
member.summary: Fetch messages from the queue and dispatch them
